fmri_mem_dataset

Source: R/fmri_dataset.R
fmri_mem_dataset.Rd

fmri_mem_dataset

fmri_mem_dataset(scans, mask, TR, event_table = data.frame(),
  base_path = ".", censor = NULL)

Arguments

scans

a list of objects of class NeuroVec
mask

a binary mask of class NeuroVol indicating the set of voxels to include in analyses
TR

the repetition time in seconds of the scan-to-scan interval.
event_table

a data.frame containing the event onsets and experimental variables.
base_path

the file path to be prepended to relative file names.
censor

a binary vector indicating which scans to remove.

Examples


d <- c(10,10,10,10)
nvec <- neuroim2::NeuroVec(array(rnorm(prod(d)), d), space=neuroim2::NeuroSpace(d))
mask <- neuroim2::NeuroVol(array(rnorm(10*10*10), d[1:3]), space=neuroim2::NeuroSpace(d[1:3]))
mask[mask < .5] <- 0
dset <- fmri_mem_dataset(list(nvec),mask, TR=2)

iter <- data_chunks(dset, nchunks=100)
